definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

sentences.english: I can come here between seven and eight.
sentences.chinese: 我七点钟和八点钟之间能来。

sentences.english: I can come here between seven and eight.
sentences.chinese: 我七点钟和八点钟之间能来。

sentences.english: What time shall I set the alarm (clock) for?
sentences.chinese: 我该把闹钟拨到几点钟响？

sentences.english: So when I woke up early this morning at 8am it was actually only 7am.
sentences.chinese: 所以，当我早上8点醒来时，实际上才7点钟。

sentences.english: The train arrived on the dot of three o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 那辆火车三点钟准时到达。

sentences.english: The students must be in the classrooms by seven o'clock at the latest.
sentences.chinese: 学生最迟也要在七点钟前进教室。

sentences.english: At six o'clock, the hospital security buzzed my room.
sentences.chinese: 在六点钟，医院保卫科叫我。

sentences.english: If Fred didn't leave till five o'clock, he can't be home yet.
sentences.chinese: 如果弗雷德五点钟以后走护短，现在还不可能到家。

sentences.english: It's Friday. The store is open until 9:00 tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今天是星期五，这家店要营业到九点钟。

sentences.english: You need not have been here so early , the meeting being at 9o?clock.
sentences.chinese: 你不必那么早，会议在9点钟才开始。

sentences.english: At 8 o 'clock in the morning, I'd like to take the plane diverted to the next station dubai.
sentences.chinese: 早上八点钟，我要搭飞机转往下一站迪拜了。

sentences.english: The last edition of this newspaper goes to press at 6 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 该报的最后一版下午六点钟付印。

sentences.english: I didn't expect you till five o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你要到五点钟才会来。

sentences.english: What time do you finish working every day?
sentences.chinese: 你每天几点钟结束工作？

sentences.english: C:He should be back by three.Would you like to leave a message?
sentences.chinese: 他3点钟应该会回来，你要留话吗？

sentences.english: Every morning I get up at seven I do some exercise and have a light breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早上七点钟起床，锻炼一下身体，然后吃早饭。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
midnight/in the middle of the night
to get out of bed/to get up
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
